DataElement.preferredName: Substance use Perceived Availability Questionnaire Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Consumption of medicine, drugs, or other materials including prescription, over-the-counter, or street drugs; alcohol; and tobacco._Available; obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Consumption of medicine, drugs, or other materials including prescription, over-the-counter, or street drugs; alcohol; and tobacco._The process of producing an internal, conscious image through stimulating a sensory system; it involves the recognition that stimulation has occurred, and the ability to discriminate various aspects of the stimulus._The quality of being obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.
